gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.jgraph
Class UIHelper

java.lang.Object
  gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.jgraph.UIHelper

public final class UIHelper
extends java.lang.Object

This class defines a list of utilities to help carry out some general functionality used in UI. This class utilizes singleton pattern.

Version:
Since caAdapter v1.2 revision $Revision: 1.1 $ date $Date: 2006-10-03 17:36:03 $
Author:
OWNER: Scott Jiang, LAST UPDATE $Author: marwahah $
